home.header.title: Le Ponthé
home.header.introduction:
Welcome to the website of the Ponthé, the audiovisual club of Les Ponts.
Here, you will be able to see and download the photos and videos made by the members of the club. You will also be able to upload your own photos and videos in each gallery.
Enjoy the viewing!
home.favoritePics.title: Your favorite photos <3 <3 !
home.contact.title: Contact the Ponthé
home.contact.subtitle: Send a sweet message to the members of the Ponthé who make you shudder with every new photo....
login.error: If you have already validated your account: wrong username or password.
material.header.title: Loan request of equipment from the Ponthé
material.header.subtitle: Fill out this form to borrow equipment from the Ponthé! Explain your project to us quickly so that we can advise you as well as possible ;)
material.form.matos.title: You wish ?
material.form.matos: The GH4 camera, microphone, fixed tripod, stabilizer, GoPro, drone....
material.form.date.title: From when to when?

members.header.title: The members of the Ponthé
members.header.subtitle: Created by a 013, Thomas Chevrier, the Ponthé has seen generations of filmmakers and photographers succeed one another...
